intro: Psychotria xantholoba, commonly known as the yellow-eyed psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its striking yellow flowers, which contrast with its dark green foliage. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests. Psychotria xantholoba is also noted for its chemical compounds, some of which have been studied for potential medicinal properties.
